s.text: And yet they continue to ignore the important work of Foster Brooks?
And yet they continue to ignore the important work of Foster Brooks?
First, if you didn't know who the two were and you were told that one of them was, as a youth, one of the great basketball players in the country, you wouldn't have picked Bill Bradley.
Bradley's "Washington bunker" line seemed particularly annoying from someone who spent 18 years in the Senate and now wants to live in ...
Did you know the late Andy Kaufman and do you have a take on this cult of personality that's grown up around him?
Will Syria and Israel find peace in the land of the Hatfields and the McCoys?

--while Gore had the full (pre-accident) Christopher Reeves look about him.
